synopsis: In episode #13, Devam shares his transformative journey after quitting his job, exploring the importance of taking a break to reconnect with oneself. He discusses his experiences with DJing, traveling, and the challenges of managing expectations while embracing creativity and personal growth.
quotes: We're not on this planet to slave away and be like productivity monkeys creating value for our bosses.
The goal of this break is to learn how to breathe.
Sometimes it's enough to just breathe. Like that's okay.
You can make a good show and the world may not be ready for it.
If you're just staying numb and in the same cycles of stress and release, you're not helping anyone.
I had to really sit down and map out my finances and be at peace with all of it.
It's important to realize why you're doing something and the context of why your surroundings are the way they are.
Your time and your energy are valuable.
Not everyone you meet that you think is cool is gonna be open to that.
You should get maybe good at one or two things at a time.
